articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Putin’s relentless assault intensifies as Russia hits Kyiv with ballistic missiles - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Kremlin says it was a revenge strike for Kyiv’s attack on a military plant in Rostov 2 days ago.
articles.content:
In Kyiv, debris from the Russian missiles killed one person and injured 10 in four districts, the city's military administration said in a statement.
A Russian hacking group on Thursday also attacke… [+1246 chars]
